headline: Control Systems Engineer
subtitle: GE Mark VIe · CIMPLICITY HMI/SCADA · Gas Turbine Controls
summary: Controls Engineer with ~2 years’ experience in GE Gas Turbine Controls (Mark VIe, ToolboxST) and CIMPLICITY HMI/SCADA. Hands-on across frames 7FA.05, 6F.03, 9F, HA including SEC projects. Skilled in logic validation, HMI development, and remote commissioning support. Strong record in troubleshooting first-fire, purge/start, and baseload problems alongwith NPI testing. Delivered automation tools that reduced engineering effort from ~2 weeks to 1–2 days and improved system reliability.
